name: Truck Simulator Highway
description:
Welcome to the best and truck driving simulator game ????! It’s time to drive big oil tanker transport trailer truck on the off-road tracks. And learn how you can take transport fuel oil tanker truck drive in top speed.

oil tanker transport truck driving game is an action-packed game in which your task is to transport fuel and oil to the required location by driving the oil tanker truck. Be a skillful offroad oil tanker transporter and get ready for the heavy duty of oil cargo transport missions.

Most exciting and thrilling offroad tanker oil cargo transport simulator game is waiting for you ????! Just download it now and let’s start your offroad track journey! This offroad driving truck transport fuel oil tanker game is not easy as it looks.

You must be an expert of offroad tanker oil transport truck driving. Drive transport fuel tanker carefully on crazy offroad tracks because there is an oil and fuel in the long trailer truck tanker. If oil tanker truck crash and damage then all the oil will spill out.

Features:
Amazing dynamic camera view angles.
Real offroad track environment.
3D graphics with oil tanker physics.
Variety of transport fuel oil tankers to drive.
Easy gameplay control.
Synchronized musical sounds
